text: Ankita Lokhande is an Indian television and Bollywood actress. She made her acting debut in 2009 with Zee TV's soap opera Drama Pavitra Rishta. Her appearance in the popular show has made her one of the highest-paid actress in the world of Indian Television. She also participated in celebrity dance reality show Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa (season 4) on Sony Entertainment Television (India). ==Television== * 2006-07 Idea Zee Cinestars as Participat * 2009-14 Pavitra Rishta as Archana Manav Dheshmukh/Ankita Naren Karmarkar Zee TV * 2011- Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa (season 4) as participat Colors TV * 2011- Comedy Circus as participat Sony TV * 2013- EK Thi Naayka as Pragya Life OK ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:Indian movie actors
title: Ankita Lokhande
